pages.text: The Sun Grenade is a weapon especially effective against $(l:)Vampires$(/l). The Sun Grenade is merely a container for sunlight it collects in a certain time span, and releases all of it in an instant. Upon sunlight release, the Sun Grenades turns back to a Quartz Sphere.

pages.title: Creating a Sun Grenade
pages.text: The Sun Grenade is created by placing a $(l:resources/quartz_sphere)Quartz Sphere$(/l) on a $(l:constructs/devices/sun_collector)Sun Collector$(/l).
